Warning to all Yelpers...never buy anything here or contract any service.  Follow this simple rule, if you ever feel pressured, trapped or scared while buying anything, DON'T BUY IT and leave immediately.  In this store, you're bound to feel all of these emotions at some point.
Recommend reservations as they can get a little busy. Also recommend the happy hour. The pork nachos are fantastic.

It's like eating dinner or lunch with a large Italian family.  Home style cooking...love the atmosphere and the price and quality of food. Celebrated my 30th birthday party there and had many other great memories. Mixed seafood dish is spicy and phenomenal.  Enjoy!

This GetGo location just so happens to be my one stop shop for breakfast on weekend mornings. With a made to order breakfast sandwich, five-hour energy, and a bottle of water, I'm ready to go. This location also has a nice cafe seating area with a microwave for use and a surcharge free Citizen's ATM inside.

Want to enjoy the cheesecake factory without a long wait? Go there at lunch time Monday thru Thursday (11 - 1) you're in and out quick. And the food always seems a little better when they're not as busy.
